<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby's recipes app with the headless CMS Contentful !
</h1>

### How i built this project
* I built the website with the help of an [udemy course](https://www.udemy.com/course/gatsby-tutorial-and-projects-course/) made by [John Smilga](https://www.udemy.com/user/janis-smilga-3/).
* I used the static framework [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/) for the front-end part and the headless CMS [Contentful](https://www.contentful.com/) to create and fetch all the data i needed.
### Launch the project
* You can take a look at the project [here](https://recipes-mici-app.netlify.app/).
#### Author
* **Micipsa Sersour** _alias_ [@MiciWeb](https://github.com/MiciWeb).
